page.title: 03Osborne House- Livestock.
page.content: {CHICKENS {--------} The breed of chicken is{Rhode Island {cross Light Sussex,}these are prolific layers.They are{free range chickens.}} They buy their chickens at about 18 weeks old and they start to lay eggs at 20-22 weeks.Altogether there are 75 chickens.These are fed twice a day, morning and evening.Some chickens have favourite laying places for example an old caravan,situated at the rear of the house.The chickens lay once a day and the eggs are different shapes and colours. {SHEEP {------} There are 25{Jacob}sheep ,they belong to the {Rare Breed Society}.They are bred for their wool.The sheep are black and white and grow up to six horns.
